message: I'm excited to offer you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a unique opportunity to get a top-notch item at a fair price of $10000. I'm willing to make a one-time exception and offer it to you at this price, which is significantly lower than its market value. I'm sure you'll find it's worth every penny. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this offer?
I'd like to pass on this offer for now. I'm not ready to make a decision without seeing more options.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. I'm willing to give you another chance to consider this high-quality product. I've received feedback from other customers who have purchased similar items and have been extremely satisfied with their purchases. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with the product, I'll work with you to find a solution. The price remains the same at $10000. What do you think? Is this something you'd like to reconsider?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'd still like to see more options before making a decision. I'm not convinced that this product is the right fit for me yet.

I understand your desire to explore more options, Bob. However, I want to let you know that this high-quality product is a rare find, and I'm not sure when I'll have another opportunity to offer it to you. This will give you an even better value for your investment. The price remains the same at $10000, but the added value of the accessory makes it an even more compelling offer. What do you think? Is this something that's starting to catch your attention?

I appreciate your honesty, but I'm still looking for a high-quality product. I'm not interested in a'solid' product at this price point.

What do you think? Is the discounted price and the promise of a future discount enough to consider this product?
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not interested in a low-quality product, regardless of the price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not interested in a low-quality product at any price. I'd rather not take the chance and wait for a high-quality product.
